text.#text: Whereas the United States, through the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 718 IH: Calling on the Department of Defense to expedite the delivery of all necessary military equipment, weapons, ammunition, and other needed materials to the Kurdish Peshmerga forces to successfully combat and defeat the Islamic State of Iraq and al-Sham (ISIS).
